title: Israel-Iran War News Updates: Biden says 'discussing' possible Israeli strikes on Iran oil facilities
description:
Israel-Iran War News Updates: Hezbollah says Israel strike targets warehouse near Beirut airport, reports AFP

A source close to Hezbollah said an Israeli strike targeted a warehouse next to Beirut airport Thursday, the latest raid since Israel stepped up its offensive against the militant group las...

title: RBI Monetary Policy: Bank Nifty rises 1% as policy stance changed to ‘Neutral’
description:
RBI Monetary Policy meeting: The Bank Nifty gained more than 1% post the monetary policy outcome on Wednesday, October 9, following a shift in stance by India's rate-setting panel.

The Bank Nifty opened at 51,021 today. The index gathered strength after the monetary policy decision, hitting the day...
